subject: Women's World Cup (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Abby Wambach’s header on a corner kick in the 79th minute and a goal by Alex Morgan in the 82nd broke a precarious 1-1 tie.
snippet: Abby Wambach’s header on a corner kick in the 79th minute and a goal by Alex Morgan in the 82nd broke a precarious 1-1 tie.
